articles.title: Fernandinho hands Oleksandr Zinchenko the captain's armband for FA Cup tie - Daily Mail
articles.description: KIERAN GILL AT THE WESTON HOMES STADIUM: Fernandinho refused the Manchester City captaincy on Tuesday night, instead telling his club to give the armband to Oleksandr Zinchenko before he walked out.
articles.content:
